Text:
how's it look? a/v?

downloading slower than my grandma sucking dicks. 

3kb/s??  DANG!

definitely the best copy available right now & a great TS in general, so cheers to that!... 

v/8
a/9

only a few minor problems... 

the action scenes can be pretty choppy, and there's a flicker on just a few very bright scenes

the audio is great, just out of sync throughout the film... 

otherwise a great copy!  Thanks for all the hard work!!!
